verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of Asaph <WH623>. Truly 'Elohim <WH430> is good <WH2896> to Yisra'EL <WH3478>, even to such as are of a clean <WH1249> heart <WH3824>.
But as for me, my feet <WH7272> were almost <WH4592> gone <WH5186> <WH8804> <WH8675> <WH5186> <WH8803>; my steps <WH838> had well nigh <WH369> slipped <WH8210> <WH8795>.
For I was envious <WH7065> <WH8765> at the foolish <WH1984> <WH8802>, when I saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the prosperity <WH7965> of the wicked <WH7563>.
For there are no bands <WH2784> in their death <WH4194>: but their strength <WH193> is firm <WH1277>.
They are not in trouble <WH5999> as other men <WH582>; neither are they plagued <WH5060> <WH8792> like <WH5973> other men <WH120>.
Therefore pride <WH1346> compasseht them about as a chain <WH6059> <WH8804>; violence <WH2555> covereth <WH5848> <WH8799> them as a garment <WH7897>.
Their eyes <WH5869> stand out <WH3318> <WH8804> with fatness <WH2459>: they have more <WH5674> <WH8804> than heart <WH3824> could wish <WH4906>.
They are corrupt <WH4167> <WH8686>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8762> wickedly <WH7451> concerning oppression <WH6233>: they speak <WH1696> <WH8762> loftily <WH4791>.
They set <WH8371> <WH8804> their mouth <WH6310> against the heavens <WH8064>, and their tongue <WH3956> walketh <WH1980> <WH8799> through the earth <WH776>.
Therefore his people <WH5971> return <WH7725> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH7725> <WH8686> hither <WH1988>: and waters <WH4325> of a full <WH4392> cup are wrung out <WH4680> <WH8735> to them.
And they say <WH559> <WH8804>, How doth 'Elohim <WH410> know <WH3045> <WH8804>? and is there <WH3426> knowledge <WH1844> in Ha `Elyon <WH5945> ?
Behold, these are the ungodly <WH7563>, who prosper <WH7961> in the world <WH5769>; they increase <WH7685> <WH8689> in riches <WH2428>.
Verily I have cleansed <WH2135> <WH8765> my heart <WH3824> in vain <WH7385>, and washed <WH7364> <WH8799> my hands <WH3709> in innocency <WH5356>.
For all the day <WH3117> long have I been plagued <WH5060> <WH8803>, and chastened <WH8433> every morning <WH1242>.
If I say <WH559> <WH8804>, I will speak <WH5608> <WH8762> thus <WH3644>; behold, I should offend <WH898> <WH8804> against the generation <WH1755> of thy children <WH1121>.
When I thought <WH2803> <WH8762> to know <WH3045> <WH8800> this, it was too painful <WH5999> for me <WH5869>;
Until I went <WH935> <WH8799> into the sanctuary <WH4720> of 'Elohim <WH410>; then understood <WH995> <WH8799> I their end <WH319>.
Surely thou didst set <WH7896> <WH8799> them in slippery places <WH2513>: thou castedst them down <WH5307> <WH8689> into destruction <WH4876>.
How are they brought into desolation <WH8047>, as in a moment <WH7281> ! they are utterly <WH5486> <WH8804> consumed <WH8552> <WH8804> with terrors <WH1091>.
As a dream <WH2472> when one awaketh <WH6974> <WH8687>; so, O YY <WH136>, when thou awakest <WH5782>, thou shalt despise <WH959> <WH8799> their image <WH6754>.
Thus my heart <WH3824> was grieved <WH2556> <WH8691>, and I was pricked <WH8150> <WH8709> in my reins <WH3629>.
So foolish <WH1198> was I, and ignorant <WH3045> <WH8799>: I was as a beast <WH929> before thee.
Nevertheless I am continually <WH8548> with thee: thou hast holden <WH270> <WH8804> me by my right <WH3225> hand <WH3027>.
Thou shalt guide <WH5148> <WH8686> me with thy counsel <WH6098>, and afterward <WH310> receive <WH3947> <WH8799> me to glory <WH3519>.
Whom have I in heaven <WH8064> but thee? and there is none upon earth <WH776> that I desire <WH2654> <WH8804> beside thee.
My flesh <WH7607> and my heart <WH3824> faileth <WH3615> <WH8804>: but 'Elohim <WH430> is the strength <WH6697> of my heart <WH3824>, and my portion <WH2506> for ever <WH5769>.
For, lo, they that are far <WH7369> from thee shall perish <WH6> <WH8799>: thou hast destroyed <WH6789> <WH8689> all them that go a whoring <WH2181> <WH8802> from thee.

But <WH589> it is good <WH2896> for me to draw near <WH7132> to 'Elohim <WH430>: I have put <WH7896> <WH8804> my trust <WH4268> in the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, that I may declare <WH5608> <WH8763> all thy works <WH4399>.
